          A Toast to Georgia Warnke
         
 Join us in celebrating Georgia Warnke's service and leadership to the campus as she retires from UC Riverside! 
 Ways to celebrate 
 Make a Toast with us on June 15 at 5-5:30pm 
Join us at  http://bit.ly/toastgeorgia   
 Share memories and congrats on her Kudoboard 
 http://bit.ly/kudosgeorgia   
 Give a gift for graduate research in her honor 
 https://ideasandsociety.ucr.edu/give/   
 
 
 
  Tuesday, June 15 at 5:00pm
           

          
            to  5:30pm 
 
  Virtual Event
